action.action-desc: Mr. Schweikert (for himself, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Ferguson, Ms. Van Duyne, Mrs. Miller of West Virginia, Mr. Steube, Mr. Smith of Nebraska, and Mr. Wenstrup) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the threshold for requiring information reporting with respect to certain payees.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Paperwork Savings Act.

section.header: Increase in threshold for requiring information reporting with respect to certain payees

subsection.text: Sections 6041(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $600 and inserting $5,000.
Section 6041 of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
In the case of any calendar year after 2024, the dollar amount in subsection (a) shall be increased by an amount equal to—

paragraph.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for such calendar year, determined by substituting calendar year 2023 for calendar year 2016 in subparagraph (A)(ii) thereof.

subsection.continuation-text: If any increase under the preceding sentence is not a multiple of $100, such increase shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of $100.

subsection.header: Application to reporting on remuneration for services and direct sales
subsection.text: Section 6041A of such Code is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(2), by striking is $600 or more and inserting equals or exceeds the dollar amount in effect for such calendar year under section 6041(a), and
in subsection (b)(1)(B), by striking is $5,000 or more and inserting equals or exceeds the dollar amount in effect for such calendar year under section 6041(a).

subsection.text: Section 3406(b)(6) of such Code is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking $600 in subparagraph (A) and inserting the dollar amount in effect for such calendar year under section 6041(a), and
by striking only where aggregate for calendar year is $600 or more in the heading and inserting only if in excess of threshold.
The heading of section 6041(a) of such Code is amended by striking of $600 or more and inserting exceeding threshold.
Section 6041(a) of such Code is amended by striking taxable year and inserting calendar year.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to payments made after December 31, 2023.
